Before we proceed, please ensure you have:

- Downloaded all the necessary data files.
- Set up the environment variables as described in the [Environment Variables](../environment.md) section.

If everything is ready, we can start reducing the data using the [JWST official pipeline](https://jwst-pipeline.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) with the help of our [NOOBFRIEND](../../index.md) package :t_rex:!
